ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon low-sodium soy sauce (such as Bragg®)
½ teaspoon finely grated fresh ginger

cookingTips: Trim the base of enoki mushrooms and separate gently to prevent tangling
Cook over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring gently to maintain delicate stems
Add soy sauce and ginger at the end to preserve their fresh flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Enoki mushrooms are delicate. How should you handle them during cooking to maintain their tender texture and elongated shape?
